wikipedia_page.main: Robert Edward Grigg (23 June 1924 – February 2002) was a British aerospace engineer, and was the chief designer of the highly-successful British Aerospace 146 (Hawker Siddeley).

response: *Bob Grigg (1924–2002) aerospace engineer, chief designer of British Aerospace 146Flight International, May 1981. Retrieved December 2017.
* Bob Grigg (1924-2002), British designer of the British Aerospace 146
